channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

title.a: Knockdown Greater Alarm Structure Fire 08/16/2023 INC#1668

item.description: Knockdown Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1668; 08:22PM; 8946 N Winnetka Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3E1rRJM; #Winnetka; 92 LAFD Firefighters took just 51 minutes in a well-coordinated offensive firefighting operation to confine stubborn flames to combustible contents, including packing materials, within the 100' x 100' one-story commercial building of fire origin, doing business as "Dan Luckow Electric". No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 BC14 BC15 BC17 BC5 CE83 CM40 CM42 E103 E104 E273 E289 E290 E293 E305 E39 E70 E72 E89 EA1 EM15 HR3 RA107 RA889 RA903 RM1 RM2 RS3 T105 T73 T89 T90 T93 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1668; 07:31PM; 8946 N Winnetka Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3E1rRJM; #Winnetka; PRELIM: Smoke showing from the rear of a 100' x 100' one-story commercial building.; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 BC14 BC15 BC17 BC5 CM40 CM42 E103 E104 E273 E289 E290 E293 E305 E39 E70 E72 E89 EM15 HR3 RA107 RA889 RA903 T105 T73 T89 T90 T93 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17, 18; Brian Humphrey

Grass Fire - Contained; INC#1561; 06:40PM; 6066 N Woodley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JmOXNT; #SepulvedaBasin; 26 ground based LAFD Firefighters contained the fire to two (2) acres of grass and vegetation (7:06 PM) . No structures. No injury. Crews will remain at scene for at least two hours to complete mop up. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E100 E288 E83 E88 E90 RA83 RA88 T88 WT88; CH8; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1560; 07:08PM; 10231 N Haines Canyon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KI5VqG; #Tujunga; 28 Firefighters took 28 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire within a 1,209 square foot one-story home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E274 E289 E298 E60 E75 E77 RA74 RA77 T74 T89 T98; CH8; 12; Brian Humphrey

Update Traffic Collision; INC#1569; 07:05PM; 458 W 51st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/45uviEd; #VermontSquare; Now 7 Patients Total: Three have been transported to area hospitals in serious to critical condition. Four others have declined medical treatment or transportation and remain at the scene. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic Division (Incident #3842) and Metro.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E21 E233 E33 E46 EM11 HR3 RA15 RA246 RA33 RA46 T33; CH7; 14; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision; INC#1569; 06:43PM; 458 W 51st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/45uviEd; #VermontSquare; PRELIM: Three vehicle collision involving a transit bus. Two critical injuries. One minor injury. Bus driver not injured. No occupants on bus. Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic Division (Incident #3842) and Metro.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E21 E233 E33 E46 EM11 HR3 RA246 RA33 T33; CH7; 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1560; 06:40PM; 10231 N Haines Canyon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KI5VqG; #Tujunga; PRELIM: Heavy fire showing from the front of a one story home.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 CM42 E24 E274 E289 E298 E60 E75 E77 EM14 RA74 RA77 T74 T89 T98; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1406; 05:40PM; 22052 W Hiawatha St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OYnq8B; #Chatsworth; 26 LAFD Firefighters took just 27 minutes to access, confine and extinguish flames in the attic of a 1,894 square foot one-story home. One female resident is currently being evaluated at scene by LAFD Paramedics for a non-specified medical complaint. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E107 E28 E296 E305 E8 RA104 RA107 T105 T96; CH9; 18; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1406; 05:13PM; 22052 W Hiawatha St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OYnq8B; #Chatsworth; PRELIM: Fire in the attic of a one story home.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E107 E28 E296 E305 E8 RA104 RA107 T105 T96; CH9; 18; Brian Humphrey

Update Traffic Collision; INC#1251; 04:35PM; 12001 W Chalon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/44fQ8q1; #Brentwood; 5 patients (undetermined ages / genders / personal or site affiliation / circumstances) in fair condition with minor injury and/or illness after a golf cart type vehicle overturned. No entrapment. Media Inquiries: LAPD West Traffic Division (Incident #3223) Notified.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E269 E37 E71 EM11 EM17 EM9 RA23 RA37 RA69 RA71 RA858 RA88 T69; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey
